name: Wadsworth

topics.response_text: If it's not one thing, it's another. Well, got to run.{mildly sarcastic}

topics.topic_text: Where can I buy more things for my place?
topics.response_text: Yes, I believe this place could do with a bit more in the way of decoration.
I'm sorry, sir. My condensation collectors need time to fully recharge before I can continue to dispense any more beverages.
Certainly. I am programmed with a multitude of hair shaping scenarios, if you would care to choose one, I would be happy to replicate it for you.

topics.topic_text: Can you explain how the My First Infirmary works?
topics.response_text: An innovation from Med-Tek, the My First Infirmary will automatically diagnose and treat any injury you might sustain.
My humor emitter array requires recharging.
Just switch on the Jukebox, and instantly the room will fill with music to keep you entertained.

topics.topic_text: Can you explain how the My First Laboratory works?
topics.response_text: From the keen minds at Med-Tek, the My First Laboratory will instantly detoxify you, removing any nasty addictions from your body.

topics.topic_text: What does the Nuka-Cola machine dispense?
topics.response_text: The Nuka-Cola machine will dispense Ice Cold Nuka-Cola.

topics.topic_text: Can you explain what the Workbench is for?
topics.response_text: If you come across any schematics in the Wasteland, you'll be able to construct its contents on this specially designed table.

conversation.response_text: You have yourself a fine day, sir.
How very nice to make your acquaintance. I'm your new Robobutler.

combat.response_text: *Sigh.* Why must you humans always resort to violence?
Dear me, how unsporting of you.
The class of people I'm forced to associate with these days just keeps falling.

description:
Wadsworth is a 210 year-old Mister Handy Male.

A Mister Handy robot who serves as a personal butler to the Lone Wanderer if they disarm the atomic bomb in Megaton. Wadsworth maintains the player's residence with precision and efficiency.

Wadsworth's Personality: Formal, polite, and meticulously programmed to provide excellent service. Wadsworth speaks with a refined British accent and takes great pride in his duties as a butler.

Wadsworth's Backstory: Wadsworth was originally manufactured by General Atomics International before the Great War. His memory banks indicate he served as a domestic assistant in a pre-war suburban home. After surviving the apocalypse in operational condition, he was eventually discovered by Megaton settlers who repurposed him for various tasks. When the Lone Wanderer disarms the atomic bomb, Wadsworth is gifted to them as a personal butler for their new residence in Megaton.
